Who: Hydras
Locatioon: Black Fortress - Throne Room


> Hydras Screamed with Pain, all the battle Had made him thousands of wounds.
> In his throne Hydras performed a scan from his wounds and his pain and
> weakness made him increase his foul mood. He would need a major
> reconstruction and opened his comlink to Cyclonus said "REPORT!!!!!"

Cyclonus' voice came to Hydras over the radio, "Hydras!" came back
quickly, "Myself, Scourge, and Jhiaxus are following behind Scorponok
as he tunnels his way in behind the Maximals. We will be prepared to
catch them from the rear if you and Perceptor can catch them at the
front."

Then it was as if Cyclonus had noticed something in Hydras' voice,
"Are you alright sir? Where is Percpetor?" The sound of drilling and
diggging could be heard in the backround of Cyclonus' transmission.

(TAG)

Preston
